0.name: Unknown Format
0.message: The data source is in an unknown format; no tabular data can be extracted

1.name: Unknown Encoding
1.message: The data source could not be successfully decoded with {encoding} encoding

2.name: HTTP Error
2.message: The data source returned an HTTP error with a status code of {status_code}

3.name: IO Error
3.message: The data source returned an IO Error of type {error_name}

2.name: Ragged Row
2.message: The row has {direction} cells than column headers

3.name: Duplicate Row
3.message: Row number {row_number} is a duplicate of a previously seen row

0.name: Missing Headers
0.message: One or more column headers is missing: {headers}

1.name: Non-Matching Headers
1.message: The given headers do not match the schema: {schema_headers} vs. {given_headers}

2.name: Badly Ordered Headers
2.message: The headers are badly ordered according to the schema: {schema_headers} vs. {given_headers}

3.name: Type Violation
3.message: The value {value} in column {column} is not a valid {type}

4.name: Format Violation
4.message: The value {value} in column {column} is not a valid {format}

5.name: Required Constraint
5.message: Column {column} is a required field, but row {row} has no value

6.name: Unique Constraint
6.message: Column {column} is a unique field, yet the value {value} found in row {row} has already been seen

7.name: Minimum Length Constraint
7.message: The value {value} in column {column} does not conform to the minimum length constraint of {constraint}

8.name: Maximum Length Constraint
8.message: The value {value} in column {column} does not conform to the maximum length constraint of {constraint}

9.name: Pattern Constraint
9.message: The value {value} in column {column} does not conform to the pattern constraint of {constraint}

10.name: Minimum Value Constraint
10.message: The value {value} in column {column} does not conform to the minimum value constraint of {constraint}

11.name: Maximum Value Constraint
11.message: The value {value} in column {column} does not conform to the maximum value constraint of {constraint}

12.name: Enumerable Value Constraint
12.message: The value {value} in column {column} does not conform to the given enumeration: {constraint}
